headline: Nebius Group Stock Earns 84 RS Rating
summary: Nebius Group Cl A shows rising price performance, earning an upgrade to its IBD Relative Strength Rating from 77 to 84.

headline: Wall Street Analysts Like These AI Stocks in 2025. Should You Buy Them?
summary: Wall Street analysts are bullish on Broadcom and ServiceNow due to their potential in the AI market.  Broadcom is benefiting enormously from increasing investment in AI infrastructure.  ServiceNow is seeing high demand for its business automation software.
